scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: One viewbook, dated 1880, with 10 illustrated views of the beach and attractions in Coney Island, Brooklyn and Rockaway, Queens. Images in the viewbook show panoramic views of both Coney Island and Rockaway, as well as hotels and piers. The viewbook was published by George Brunswick.
